import React, { Component } from "react"; import { API, graphqlOperation } from "aws-amplify"; import * as queries from "../src/graphql/queries"; const facilityDetail = props => ( <> {console.log(props.facility)}

); facilityDetail.getInitialProps = async function({ query }) { const facility = await API.graphql( graphqlOperation(queries.getFacility, { id: query.id }) ); return { facility: facility.data.getFacility }; }; export default facilityDetail;
